price: ហើយចូរអ្នកអត់ធ្មត់ចុះ ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ អល់ឡោះ មិនធ្វើឱ្យបាត់បង់នូវផលបុណ្យរបស់បណ្ដាអ្នកដែលសាងអំពើ ល្អនោះឡើយ។
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'bir fa-inna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-muḥ'sinīna
